bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require municipalities to maintain water and sewer connections and to limit the ability to assess an abutting property owner. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 9-47-6 be amended to read as follows: 9-47-6. Every municipality shall have power to Each municipality may regulate and provide for the laying of water connections from the city water mains to the lot line , and to assess the cost against the abutting property owner as provided by this title. However, each municipality is responsible for the replacement and maintenance of the water line to the lot line and may not assess the cost of such replacement and maintenance against the abutting property owner. Section 2. That § 9-48-7 be amended to read as follows: 9-48-7. Every municipality shall have power to Each municipality may regulate and provide for the laying of sewer connections from the city trunk or service sewers , to the lot line , and to assess the cost against the abutting property owner as provided by this title. However, each municipality is responsible for the replacement and maintenance of the sewer line to the lot line and may not assess the cost of such replacement and maintenance against the abutting property owner. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require municipalities to maintain water and sewer connections and to limit the ability to charge an abutting property owner. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 9-47-6 be amended to read as follows: 9-47-6. Every municipality shall have power to Each municipality may regulate and provide for the laying of water connections from the city water mains to the lot line , and to assess the cost against the abutting property owner as provided by this title. However, each municipality is responsible for the replacement and maintenance of the water line to the lot line and may not charge the cost of such replacement and maintenance against the abutting property owner except by special assessment. Section 2. That § 9-48-7 be amended to read as follows: 9-48-7. Every municipality shall have power to Each municipality may regulate and provide for the laying of sewer connections from the city trunk or service sewers , to the lot line , and to assess the cost against the abutting property owner as provided by this title. However, each municipality is responsible for the replacement and maintenance of the sewer line to the lot line and may not charge the cost of such replacement and maintenance against the abutting property owner except by special assessment.
